original_text: The ruler may choose to make a special gift to the Lord. It may be a burnt offering or a friendship offering. They must open the east gate of the inside yard for the ruler. He will make his offering at the gate, as he does on Sabbath days. Then he must go out. After he has left, they will shut the gate.
korean_text: 만일 군주가 자원하여 번제를 준비하거나 혹은 자원하여 감사제를 준비하여 나 여호와께 드릴 때에는 그를 위하여 동쪽을 향한 문을 열고 그가 번제와 감사제를 안식일에 드림 같이 드리고 밖으로 나갈지며 나간 후에 문을 닫을지니라

sentences.original_text: The ruler may choose to make a special gift to the Lord
sentences.korean_translation: 통치자는 주께 특별한 선물을 드리기로 선택할 수 있습니다

sentences.original_text: It may be a burnt offering
They must open the east gate of the inside yard
He will make his offering at the gate
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 그 문에서 제물을 드릴 것입니다

sentences.original_text: as he does on Sabbath days
